Everything You Need to Create Amazing Content

Powerful features designed to make SCORM authoring accessible to everyone

AI-Assisted Content

Generate engaging educational content, quizzes, and activities with AI-powered suggestions tailored to your subject.

Ready-Made Templates

Start with professionally designed templates for lessons, courses, and assessments. Customize to match your brand.

Universal Export

Export to SCORM 1.2, SCORM 2004, or xAPI with one click. Compatible with all major LMS platforms.

Team Collaboration

Work together with colleagues in real-time. Share resources, review content, and maintain consistency.

Built-in Analytics

Track learner engagement and performance with comprehensive analytics and reporting tools.

Multi-Language Support

Create content in English, Arabic, Spanish, French, and more. RTL support included.

Lightning Fast

Build and export packages in minutes, not days. Our optimized workflow keeps you productive.

Sell Your Content

Monetize your expertise by selling packages on our marketplace. Set your own prices and earn revenue.

Smart Suggestions

Get contextual recommendations for images, activities, and assessments as you build.
